page.title: 17Arts and Crafts
page.content:
Country crafts and art forms are to be found in most rural areas and this particular area is no exception. There is a{Textile Artist}who works in traditional and modern embroidery. One type is stumpwork - an old style dating back to the 16th and 17th centuries. Another embroiderer works in decorative cross stitch on various articles. There are three{potters} making various kinds of earthenware - slipware, ceramics and jewellery. There is a{spinner}and{weaver}of the local Herdwick wool. There is a local historian and a steamboat engineer and builder.
Other crafts include water colour painting, hand painted silk cards, lavender bags etc., many of which are sold in local shops.
